morphs.title: Strategy
morphs.name: Strategy
morphs.short: A 4-phase framework that keeps delivery predictable and measurable.

content.headline: Process — How we work.
content.lead: A 4-phase framework that keeps delivery predictable and measurable.

phases.name: Discovery
phases.inputs: Stakeholders, analytics, product metrics, tech stack audit
phases.outputs: Success metrics, problem statements, feasibility notes, prioritized backlog

phases.name: Strategy & Architecture
phases.deliverables: Architecture doc, tech choices, timeline, automation blueprints, API contracts, data models

phases.name: Design & Prototype
phases.deliverables: High-fidelity prototypes, acceptance criteria, usability tests, design system

phases.name: Build & Launch
phases.deliverables: Deployed product, monitoring, runbook, iterative sprints, QA, security review

phases.name: Optimize & Scale
phases.deliverables: Continuous measurement, A/B tests, pipeline improvements

content.microcopy: We embed KPIs in the contract. We ship telemetry and test fast.

seo.title: Our Process · Kairo Studio
seo.description: 4-phase framework: Discovery, Strategy, Design, Build & Launch. Predictable delivery with measurable outcomes.

caseStudies.title: Vellapanti — Youth Entertainment Platform
caseStudies.summary: Automated content pipeline and SEO optimization that quadrupled publishing speed
caseStudies.problem: Manual publishing workflows, inconsistent SEO implementation, and slow engagement feedback loops were limiting content velocity and organic growth.
caseStudies.solution: Built automated content pipeline with editorial scheduler, analytics dashboard, and comprehensive SEO optimizations integrated into the CMS workflow.
approach: Conducted content workflow audit and identified bottlenecks
Designed headless CMS architecture with Sanity
Built custom publishing API with automated SEO checks
Implemented editorial scheduler with role-based permissions
Created real-time analytics dashboard with GA4 integration
Deployed on Cloudflare Workers for edge performance

testimonial.quote: Kairo automated our publishing and improved organic traffic by 230% in 4 months. The system just works.
testimonial.author: Head of Growth

caseStudies.learnings: Automating editorial workflows requires deep user research with content teams. The biggest wins came from small UX improvements in the daily publishing flow, not just technical optimization.
caseStudies.nextSteps: Phase 2: Personalization engine and A/B testing framework for content variants.

caseStudies.title: D2C Automation Suite
caseStudies.summary: Unified order pipeline and automated retention flows that recovered 25% abandoned revenue
caseStudies.problem: Manual order update notifications, high cart abandonment, and disconnected retention campaigns were limiting revenue recovery and customer lifetime value.
caseStudies.solution: Built unified order pipeline with real-time notifications, intelligent cart abandonment recovery, and dynamic ad optimization based on customer behavior.
approach: Mapped entire customer journey and identified automation opportunities
Integrated Shopify webhooks with custom middleware
Built smart retention flow engine with personalization
Set up real-time monitoring and alerting

testimonial.quote: Their automation stack saved us 120 hours per month and improved repeat purchase rate by 30%. ROI was clear within 8 weeks.
testimonial.author: COO

caseStudies.learnings: E-commerce automation ROI comes from the compound effect of small optimizations across the entire funnel, not single silver bullets.
caseStudies.nextSteps: Predictive reorder automation and subscription optimization framework.

caseStudies.title: Real-time Analytics for Fintech
caseStudies.summary: Event-driven ETL and real-time dashboard processing $2M daily
caseStudies.problem: Slow manual reporting, reconciliation errors, and lack of real-time visibility into transaction flows were creating operational risk.
caseStudies.solution: Built event-driven ETL pipeline with real-time analytics dashboard, role-based access controls, and automated anomaly detection.
approach: Designed event-driven architecture for real-time data processing
Built ETL pipeline with Apache Kafka
Created role-based dashboard with custom charts
Implemented automated reconciliation with error alerts
Added anomaly detection with ML-based thresholds

testimonial.quote: The real-time dashboard gave us visibility we never had. Reconciliation went from 8 hours to 30 minutes.
testimonial.author: CFO

caseStudies.learnings: Real-time financial systems require obsessive attention to data accuracy and audit trails. Performance is important, but correctness is critical.
caseStudies.nextSteps: Predictive analytics and automated fraud detection.
